title: (x) Danish Wind Industry - Foundry Gridnik {Karl}
content:
Hi,   
   
I have been trying to discove what this typeface is. I have seen it on Emily Carr posters, GQ Magazine, Massive Attack's 100th Window album, and the Danish Wind Industry website. Does anyone have any idea what it is called? Any help would be much appreciated!   
   
! ![What typeface is this?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415140240im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48943.gif)

 [‹ (x) Nextlevel Electronics Inc. - Agency, Bank Gothic {Grant, Jes](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415140240/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6668 "Go to previous forum topic") [Camouflage font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415140240/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6662 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: Thank you so much! I really appreciate it.
